oai_dc:dc.dc:title: I Heart Egypt bumper sticker
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kassem, Marwa
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Text in image: I 'Heart' Egypt. Photographer's description: Photos and videos of p[r]otestors and activities taking place in Tahrir Square during the last week of 18 days from Feb 4-11, 2011[.] Also includes photos from Geneva, Switzerland of demonstrations taking place from Jan 28-Feb 3, 2011[.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions
Bumper stickers
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
